Welcome <@UG9KZFYBB> :clapping: We're super excited to have you a part of our HubSpot CMS Developer community. :hamsterdance:

How has your HubSpot CMS experience been so far?
Welcome <@UG9UFEG4S> - We're excited to have you a part of our HubSpot developer community! :bmo: Do you have any projects you're working on? or just exploring?
Welcome <@UG8CXGY1E> - We're happy to have you a part of our HubSpot Developer community! :smiley: How has your HubSpot CMS experience been so far?

Hi <@U22PKFRU5>, its been an amazing experience using HubSpot so far, i have worked in 4 projects, and HubSpot has been updated since a lot. But i like its new  HTML & Hubl in design manager for creating templates..
